price: Ponajbolji između njih reče: “Nisam li vam ja govorio zašto Allaha ne slavite!”
arabic: قَالَ أَوۡسَطُهُمۡ أَلَمۡ أَقُل لَّكُمۡ لَوۡلَا تُسَبِّحُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qāla awsaṭuhum alam aqul lakum lawlā tusabbiḥūna
